text: (Nchimwene) jwatite (kwa achimmasyeto): “Ana abali jenu jaliji uli pandema jamwannyengaga Yusufu jwalakwe akakusaka?” Ŵanganyao ŵatite: “Allah ayitalichisye (yaulemwa wa Yusufu)! Pangali yakusakala iliyose yatwaimanyi kukwakwe.” Ŵankwao ŵakuchimbika (anduna) ŵatite: “Sambano nipaimanyukwiche kusyene yakuona. Une nijunannyengaga jwalakwe akakusaka, soni jwalakwe chisimu chene juli mwa ŵandu ŵakuonaonape.”
